name: sytex-reports
title: Sytex Reports
description: This skill should be used when the user asks about Sytex data: tasks, projects, forms, sites, clients, materials, workflows, users, or AI credits consumption. Trigger phrases: how many tasks, tasks completed by, AI credits consumed, report from Sytex, statistics for [org name], data from [instance]. Covers organizations in: app, claro, ufinet, dt, adc, atis, exsei, integrar, torresec, telesoluciones.
